short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to apply a font of your choice to a webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to apply a font of your choice to a webpage. 

This is useful for people with visual and reading disabilities as different fonts may be more useful than others for reading comprehension.

Update fixed install issue with "Couldn't decode image" error.
